title: Boots of Swiftness Idea.
body:
Boots of Swiftness have been nerfed into the ground essentially. They're only marginally 'more swift' than Merc Treads.

However, what if Riot were to add a passive to them that gave the wearer a movement speed increase in Bursts after running long enough or an activated burst of speed: either method using a set cooldown.

It would keep them "Swift" without completely stomping out other boots and making Boots of Mobility irrelevant for sustained movement speed.

replies.body: Perhaps some kind of reverse Boots of Mobility, where you only gain MS when you're actively in combat.
Maybe they need to change the name...

I mean, we have that passive on an item already...

It's called dead man's plate.

And we have that active too...  It's called ghost.  Or Righteous Glory in item form.
Either something like that or change the name.
I'd hate to see these completely removed from the game. Frankly, I like the icon far too much.
